selectRandomNode() - Method in class usernode.SystemInfo
This function randomly returns the identifier of one of the nodes that is still alive

This methods set the dead in the list of available nodes.

This function changes the identifier of the admin.

This methods set the node with identifier ID alive in the list of available nodes.

This methods set the node with identifier ID dead in the list of available nodes.

This function is used to keep a reference to the StateUpdate thread/class
simulateFailure() - Method in class usernode.UserCom
This function sends the failure message to the admin node.

This class takes care of updating the information regarding the nodes that are considered alive.
